body_html:
I am able to build clean the pip wheel target from head of master (as of 9.30a (pacific) today) via bazel build --config=opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package - no non-default values in the build configuration setup.

I'm using 0.5.3 Bazel:

autogenic:tensorflow loki$ bazel version
Build label: 0.5.3-homebrew
Build target: bazel-out/darwin_x86_64-opt/bin/src/main/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/bazel/BazelServer_deploy.jar
Build time: Sun Aug 6 12:54:10 2017 (1502024050)
Build timestamp: 1502024050
Build timestamp as int: 1502024050
autogenic:tensorflow loki$

body:
I am able to build clean the pip wheel target from head of master (as of 9.30a (pacific) today) via `bazel build --config=opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package` - no non-default values in the build configuration setup.

I'm using 0.5.3 Bazel:
```
autogenic:tensorflow loki$ bazel version
